### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 10.5, 10.5), boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0)
-  Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0)

### Lab
Consists of lab (position not specified) with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Chests
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position 43.5, -82.5) with inventory {'coal': 71}
-  Chest (position 40.5, -80.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest (position 43.5, -81.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest (position -16.5, -49.5) with inventory {'iron-ore': 115}
-  Chest (position 2.5, 0.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest (position 0.5, 2.5) with empty inventory

### Inserter systems
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5) with fuel {'coal': 45} and connected to chest (position 2.5, 0.5)
-  Burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5) with fuel {'coal': 43} and connected to chest (position 0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment
-  Ensure burner equipment has sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure furnaces have sufficient ingredients to smelt
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure steam engines have input liquid and fluid present in connections
### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure boilers have sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure offshore pumps have sufficient fluid to operate
### Errors when using pipe groups
-  Ensure pipe groups are properly connected to fluid systems
### Errors when using electricity groups
-  Ensure electricity groups have sufficient voltage to operate
